snippet.title: IBM Unveils Small-Business Mainframe
snippet.description:
IBM Unveils Small-Business Mainframe
By Katie Dean 02:30 AM EDT 04/27/06
Big Blue trots out its technology for small and medium-size businesses especially targeted to China.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/10281914/1/ibm-unveils-small-business-mainframe.html

snippet.title: Ratech to ask to tap portion of DIP

Ratech to ask to tap portion of DIP
